attributes.action: Pay a decent wage for adult social care workers, support workers and carers.
attributes.additional_details:
ITS TIME TO CHANGE !! Lets start giving these workers a decent wage and a decent living and stop taking advantage of decent nice human beings. 

Remember being a carer is one of the most important jobs in the world so why are we being paid minimum wage?
attributes.background: Most workers in the care sector are only being paid minimum wage, Although it is a rewarding job it is also a very difficult job, Carers on a daily basis are being kicked punched verbally and physically abused, Giving personal care cleaning up Faeces and urine with lack of appreciation.
